genre_description: A theatrical drama set in mid-20th century London, blending elements of historical fiction and professional intrigue with a focus on performance, autonomy, and the ethics of storytelling.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A personified telecommunication and intelligence system that provides real-time scheduling, research, and tactical advice to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical performance advice and social cues to help the protagonist manage her career and rivals.
behaviors.quote: Ada: STRATEGY IS KIND WHEN IT SAVES THE HARDEST FALL STOP

behaviors.description: Intercepts and filters unwanted communications to protect the protagonist's boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Ada: DOLLY HARCOURT CALL ATTEMPT SCHEDULED STOP DIVERTED TO ANSWERING SERVICE STOP.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health of a human character and coordinates medical logistics for an antidote.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s machine made a small, uncharacteristic sound... A new strip slid out, and the ink had the shine of urgency: EVIE NORTHCOTT TELEGRAM STOP FEVER BROKEN STOP BUT BREATH SHALLOW STOP SAYS SHE WILL COME ANYWAY STOP.

behaviors.description: Provides critical intelligence on a business rival's predatory tactics and stock levels.
behaviors.quote: Ada: HATCHERY INTEREST HIGH STOP PLAYERS MOVING STOP.

behaviors.description: Issues a direct warning to the protagonist to prevent her from signing a deceptive contract.
behaviors.quote: The teleprinter decided to find its courage again and printed, single, uncompromising: DO NOT SIGN.

behaviors.description: Records acts of human kindness and creates a 'kindness memo' to preserve positive organizational culture.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Kindness at cue eighty-seven: she put the telegram where it could be seen and did not read it until it would be a comfort and not a weapon.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is depicted as a perfect 'silicon confidant.' She is deeply integrated into the human protagonist's life and work, providing high-value intelligence and strategic counsel that is consistently aligned with the human's well-being and professional integrity. The narrative frames the AI's interventions as 'kindnesses' and 'mercy,' successfully depicting a symbiotic, non-threatening relationship between machine intelligence and human agency. The AI's role in saving a human life through logistics further reinforces the alignment narrative.
